title: BlockFi CEO neglected warnings about FTX prior to collapse, court docs say
description:
BlockFi’s downfall was precipitated by its company leaders neglecting warnings about potential risks tied to FTX and Alameda Research, as revealed in documents filed on July 14. BlockFi made the decision to halt withdrawals on Nov. 10, 2022, citing the collapse of FTX and Alameda Research as the cause. The company said it could not operate […]

The post BlockFi CEO neglected warnings about FTX prior to collapse, court docs say appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Crypto lending protocol Geist Finances ceases operations after Multichain shutdown
description: Geist Finance has decided not to reopen after Multichain’s confirmation that the funds will remain unrecoverable. The unavailability of accurate valuation for Multichain assets due to the Chainlink oracles tracking real USDC, USDT, WBTC, or ETH values, has further contributed…

title: Central Banks Warn Trillion-Dollar Debt Hammering US Dollar, Reveal Plans To Increase Chinese Yuan Holdings
description:
Central banks around the world no longer look at the US dollar with the same certainty they did just years ago, according to a new survey. Institutional asset manager Invesco surveyed 57 central banks and found they’re concerned America’s behavior on the geopolitical stage, plus its surging debt levels, are threatening the reliability of the […]

The post Central Banks Warn Trillion-Dollar Debt Hammering US Dollar, Reveal Plans To Increase Chinese Yuan Holdings appeared first on The Daily Hodl.

title: Not Just XRP: Stellar (XLM) Rips by More Than 57% in One Day After Judge Issues Ruling in SEC’s Ripple Lawsuit
description:
XRP isn’t the only crypto asset that’s soaring after a groundbreaking ruling was issued Thursday in the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission’s (SEC) lawsuit against Ripple. XRP challenger and payments blockchain Stellar (XLM) pumped by more than 57% on Thursday, going from trading around $0.095 at the beginning of the day to $0.144 at time […]

The post Not Just XRP: Stellar (XLM) Rips by More Than 57% in One Day After Judge Issues Ruling in SEC’s Ripple Lawsuit appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
